mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faqs (category_id, question, answer, order_num, is_active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ( (SELECT category_id FROM faq_categories WHERE category_name = #{category} LIMIT 1), #{question}, #{answer}, #{orderNum}, #{isActive}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT f.faq_id, fc.category_name AS category, f.question, f.answer, f.order_num, f.is_active, f.created_at, f.updated_at FROM faqs f LEFT JOIN faq_categories fc ON f.category_id = fc.category_id WHERE f.faq_id = #{faqId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT f.faq_id, fc.category_name AS category, f.question, f.answer, f.order_num, f.is_active, f.created_at, f.updated_at FROM faqs f LEFT JOIN faq_categories fc ON f.category_id = fc.category_id WHERE f.is_active = TRUE ORDER BY f.order_num ASC, f.created_at DESC

SELECT f.faq_id, fc.category_name AS category, f.question, f.answer, f.order_num, f.is_active, f.created_at, f.updated_at FROM faqs f LEFT JOIN faq_categories fc ON f.category_id = fc.category_id WHERE fc.category_name = #{category} AND f.is_active = TRUE ORDER BY f.order_num ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE faqs SET category_id = (SELECT category_id FROM faq_categories WHERE category_name = #{category} LIMIT 1), question = #{question}, answer = #{answer}, order_num = #{orderNum}, is_active = #{isActive}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE faq_id = #{faqId}
mapper.select: SELECT f.faq_id, fc.category_name AS category, f.question, f.answer, f.order_num, f.is_active, f.created_at, f.updated_at FROM faqs f LEFT JOIN faq_categories fc ON f.category_id = fc.category_id WHERE f.is_active = TRUE AND ( f.question LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR f.answer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR fc.category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) ORDER BY CASE WHEN f.question = #{keyword} THEN 1 WHEN f.question LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%') THEN 2 WHEN f.question LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') THEN 3 WHEN f.answer LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%') THEN 4 ELSE 5 END, f.order_num ASC, f.created_at DESC
